name: Techies
title: Squee, Spleen and Spoon
lore: Three maniacal goblins united by a love of explosions, Techies cover the battlefield with deadly mines.

stickyBomb.name: Sticky Bomb
stickyBomb.description: Throws a bomb that sticks to enemies, detonating after a delay.

reactiveTagging.name: Reactive Tagging
reactiveTagging.description: Places a sign that disarms enemies who walk through it.

blastOff.name: Blast Off!
blastOff.description: Techies leap to a target area, silencing enemies on landing while damaging themselves.

proximityMines.name: Proximity Mines
proximityMines.description: Places an invisible mine that detonates when enemies approach.
